title: Will self-driving cars become more popular than normal cars? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let’s look at the record. The last self driving car on a US road killed someone. The reason was determined to be faulty software. Would you risk your life riding in a car that some brilliant hacker can upload a program to to have the car self-drive itself, with you and your family, off a bridge ? Don’t say it can’t happen because it definitely can.
Hi, TBH I think self driving cars are already more popular than normal cars. Even though its not available for the general public. Just the idea of a self driving car is popular enough.
